verses.roman:
jīva-bahu māri' kaila cāklā saba nāśa
ethā tumi kailā mora sarva kārya nāśa

synonyms: jīva—living entities; bahu—many; māri'-killing; kaila—did; cāklā—the province of Bengal; saba—all; nāśa—destruction; ethā—here; tumi—you; kailā—did; mora—my; sarva—all; kārya—plans; nāśa—destruction.
translation: "By killing many living entities, your elder brother has destroyed all Bengal. Now here you are destroying all my plans."
